section_title: Meaning of “port” and “madeira” as applied to wine.
section_text: 1 The description “port” or “madeira” applied to any wine or other liquor, other than wine the produce of Portugal and the island of Madeira respectively, shall be deemed to be a false trade description within the meaning of  the  Trade Descriptions Act 1968 , and that Act shall have effect accordingly: ... a . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . b . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
2 This Act may be cited as the Anglo-Portuguese Commercial Treaty Act, 1914.
